Articles.Content: Just wanted to say hi and how much I enjoy this game, lots of fun and takes up way to much of my time. Oh, and I really enjoy all the Moding that going on fantastic fun. Long the the Kerbals!!!

Hi penguin405 and welcome to the forums!

The game can take up quite a bit of your time, I often look at my clock only to realise it's an hour or so later than I thought.

Have fun playing!

Welcome to the forums penguin405

Yeah it is a time consumer although secretly you don't mind

Sleep was very much sacrificed when I first got the game.

Happy Engineering!

Sleep was very much sacrificed when I first got the game.

Happy Engineering!

Grades were very much sacrificed when I found this game. Also welcome Penguin415

Welcome to the forums Penguin415.

It took lots of my time up too, but the game is part of a subject I like a lot (space).

We all love the modders that bring various new and cool things to the game, C7 recently posted a modding tutorial if you want to get started yourself.

Have fun playing KSP and go blow up some rockets!

Hi penguin405, welcome to the forums

Have fun, now go launch some rockets
